'''Seafol''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A trader with sun-burnished skin and straw-like hair loosely pinned into a tumbling rat's nest, waves both hands eagerly in your line of sight.

This close, you can see how her nose and cheeks are dashed with freckles. She turns her head to the side, and you get a good look at the puckered scar that curls from her right temple, and down to the corner of her lips.}}
Seafol is a [Príncipi](/principiSenPatrena/) agent in [Crookspur](/crookspur/), assisting in [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/)' operation against the slavers. As well as offering various "tools of the trade" to help you out, Seafol has a skiff waiting for any slaves you manage to liberate.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = "Elusion" wares - a collection of tools and some explosives.
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/): She is [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/)' contact in Crookspur.
[Category:Crookspur characters](/categoryCrookspurCharacters/)

'''Seafol''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|A trader with sun-burnished skin and straw-like hair loosely pinned into a tumbling rat's nest, waves both hands eagerly in your line of sight.

This close, you can see how her nose and cheeks are dashed with freckles. She turns her head to the side, and you get a good look at the puckered scar that curls from her right temple, and down to the corner of her lips.}}
Seafol is a [[Príncipi sen Patrena|Príncipi]] agent in [[Crookspur]], assisting in [[Captain Aeldys]]' operation against the slavers. As well as offering various "tools of the trade" to help you out, Seafol has a skiff waiting for any slaves you manage to liberate.
